Description: Landlord will pay half the brokers fee! Available September 1st.This sunny, newly renovated floor through two bedroom offers an open floor plan, a fully applianced kitchen, SS appliances, hardwood floors along with two equal size bedrooms. Separate sunroom that can be used as a flex room. Washer/dryer in basement, extra storage and shared backyard complete this home. Pets welcome. Close to MBTA and all East Boston has to offer.
